title: [Whistler's Pass]
description: Heavy clouds of various shape drift across the night sky, their presence dimming the pale light of the moon.  A chill wind whips through the pass, sending the gnarled branches of small shrubs and bushes into a flurry of commotion.  In a moment, they settle, returning to their grim and silent existence.

Heavy clouds of various shape drift across the grey sky, their presence sending long shadows across the canyon floor.  A chill wind whips through the pass, sending the gnarled branches of small shrubs and bushes into a flurry of commotion.  In a moment, they settle, returning to their grim and silent existence.
